h2_title: How to Find the Giant Shigandang
content: To be able to summon it, you'll need to have collected the Skandhas through the previous Chapters. If you haven't already got your hands on these Skandhas, follow our guide to collecting them all here.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Giant_Shigandang.md', within the main section titled 'Giant Shigandang', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Giant Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
To be able to summon it, you'll need to have collected the Skandhas through the previous Chapters. If you haven't already got your hands on these Skandhas, follow our guide to collecting them all here.
